#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
		int n,i;
		cin>>n;
		int a[n+1];
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
		}
		int q;
		cin>>q;
		while(q--)
		{
			int b,c;
			cin>>b>>c;
			int max = a[b];
			int flag =0;
			for(i=b+1;i<c;i++)
			{
				if(a[i]>max)
				{
					flag =1;
					break;
				}
			}
			if(flag == 1)
			{
				cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
			}
			else
			{
				cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
		}
	}
}
